long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension parses a page for images and stores them in a new tab where they can be renamed and downloaded in zip format. Image alt-text is also stored and can be edited and exported along with the images.

Also features an image gallery to view each image individually.
